description.raw:
This backports two fixes to `SystemPaths` from the `citadel_deps_msgs` branch:

* d137f54 is grafted directly and fixes a race condition during initialization of the `static PathDelimiter` variable by replacing it with a `pathDelimiter()` function.

* c5b0aa1 is not fully used because `ignition-common` isn't a required dependency in gazebo9, but a missing call to `sdf::addURIPath` is added as a one-line fix.

See the following thread for more context:

* #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/3139/update-to-ignition-citadel-dependencies-c/diff#comment-130449637
description.html:

  • d137f54 is grafted directly and fixes a race condition during initialization of the static PathDelimiter variable by replacing it with a pathDelimiter() function.

  • c5b0aa1 is not fully used because ignition-common isn't a required dependency in gazebo9, but a missing call to sdf::addURIPath is added as a one-line fix.

See the following thread for more context:

  • #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/3139/update-to-ignition-citadel-dependencies-c/diff#comment-130449637

title.raw: SystemPaths: replace static PathDelimiter variable with pathDelimiter() function to avoid undefined static initialization behavior
title.html: SystemPaths: replace static PathDelimiter variable with pathDelimiter() function to avoid undefined static initialization behavior
